FuncDef: This command displays the content of an input file in plain text.
CLIs: display type { type } <url-string> format { format } [ password [ <32> <chars> <max> ] ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the local CF card url of the input file.
Specifies the type of input file, possible values are cert/key/crl/cert-request. Values-cert, key, crl, cert-request.
Specifies the format of input file. Values-pkcs10, pkcs12, pkcs7-der, pkcs7-pem, pem, der.
Specifies the password to decrypt the input file in case that it is an encrypted PKCS#12 file, up to 99 characters in length.
